OU.Name: Roles
OU.Description: This holds the administrative roles for the domain

OU.Name: Permissions
OU.Description: Each sub OU holds permissive groups for that application/service

OU.Name: Local Rights
OU.Description: These groups are added to it's respective local group on the computer

OU.Name: New Machines
OU.Description: Any computer not joined without being prestaged is placed here for security

OU.Name: Admins
OU.Description: Each sub OU defines a role

OU.Name: Sys Admins
OU.Description: Accounts with full admin access over the domain

OU.Name: Service Accounts
OU.Description: Where a group managed account is not possible create service accounts here

OU.Name: Deactivated
OU.Description: Deactivated service accounts due to inactivity
